alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wakulla County through 315 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crawfordville. This storm was drifting southward. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, St. Marks, Woodville, Wakulla, Shadeville, Wakulla Beach, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Arran, Bethel and Tully. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
